gmcm.section.general.tooltip: Basic controls for enabling/disabling map preloading.
gmcm.section.nearest.tooltip: Controls for preloading only the nearest warp(s) while you walk around.
gmcm.section.performance.tooltip: Limits to keep preloading lightweight each tick.
gmcm.enabled.name: Enabled
gmcm.enabled.tooltip: Turn Location Preload on or off.
gmcm.mode.name: Preload mode
gmcm.mode.tooltip: Hub: preload all exits after you enter a location. Nearest: preload only the nearest door/exit as you approach. Both: use both strategies.
gmcm.hubPreloadWarpTargets.name: Hub: preload warp targets
gmcm.hubPreloadWarpTargets.tooltip: When enabled (and mode includes Hub), after you enter a location it queues the locations you can warp to from there.
gmcm.clearQueueOnWarp.name: Clear queue on warp
gmcm.clearQueueOnWarp.tooltip: Clears pending preloads whenever you change locations. Already-preloaded maps stay remembered for the day.
gmcm.customLocations.name: Custom locations
gmcm.customLocations.tooltip: Extra location names to preload (comma-separated). Example: Town, Forest, Mountain
gmcm.nearestWarpCount.name: Nearest: warp count
gmcm.nearestWarpCount.tooltip: How many nearest warp destinations to queue each check.
gmcm.nearestMaxDistance.name: Nearest: max distance
gmcm.nearestMaxDistance.tooltip: Only consider warps within this Manhattan distance (0 = unlimited).
gmcm.nearestCheckIntervalTicks.name: Nearest: check interval (ticks)
gmcm.nearestCheckIntervalTicks.tooltip: How often to scan for the nearest warp(s). Lower = more responsive, higher = less overhead.
gmcm.preferFacingWarp.name: Nearest: prefer facing warp
gmcm.preferFacingWarp.tooltip: When distances tie, prioritize the warp tile directly in front of the player.
gmcm.maxMapsPerTick.name: Max maps per tick
gmcm.maxMapsPerTick.tooltip: How many maps to preload each tick (0 = no limit). Lower values reduce risk of micro-stutter.
gmcm.maxMillisecondsPerTick.name: Max ms per tick
gmcm.maxMillisecondsPerTick.tooltip: Time budget per tick for preloading (0 = unlimited). If both limits are set, the first reached stops loading.
gmcm.verboseLogging.name: Verbose logging
gmcm.verboseLogging.tooltip: Log every map preload to the SMAPI console (useful for debugging).
